text: Zzyzx , formerly Camp Soda and Soda Springs, is an unincorporated community in San Bernardino County, California, United States. It is within the boundaries of Mojave National Preserve. Text also in ==References== ==Other websites== * Ecological sites along U.S. Interstate 15 Small photo of road sign * Zzyzx photos and historical information * Center for Land Use Interpretation site page with directions, details, photos, and map link Category:Unincorporated communities in California Category:Settlements in San Bernardino County, California
title: Zzyzx, California
